title: Phoenix RowHammer Attack Bypasses Advanced DDR5 Memory Protections in 109 Seconds
description: A team of academics from ETH ZÃ¼rich and Google has discovered a new variant of a RowHammer attack targeting Double Data Rate 5 (DDR5) memory chips from South Korean semiconductor vendor SK Hynix. The RowHammer attack variant, codenamed Phoenix (CVE-2025-6202, CVSS score: 7.1), is capable of bypassing sophisticated protection mechanisms put in place to resist the attack. "We have proven that
